params.name: vocab_size
params.description: Vocabulary size of the BERT model. Defines the number of different tokens that can be represented by theinputs_ids passed when calling TransfoXLModel or TFTransfoXLModel.

params.name: cutoffs
params.description: Cutoffs for the adaptive softmax.

params.name: d_model
params.description: Dimensionality of the models hidden states.

params.name: d_embed
params.description: Dimensionality of the embeddings

params.name: n_head
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: d_head
params.description: Dimensionality of the models heads.

params.name: d_inner
params.description: Inner dimension in FF

params.name: div_val
params.description: Divident value for adapative input and softmax

params.name: pre_lnorm
params.description: Whether or not to apply LayerNorm to the input instead of the output in the blocks.

params.name: n_layer
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: mem_len
params.description: Length of the retained previous heads.

params.name: clamp_len
params.description: Use the same pos embeddings after clamp_len.

params.name: same_length
params.description: Whether or not to use the same attn length for all tokens

params.name: proj_share_all_but_first
params.description: True to share all but first projs, False not to share.

params.name: attn_type
params.description: Attention type. 0 for Transformer-XL, 1 for Shaw et al, 2 for Vaswani et al, 3 for Al Rfou et al.

params.name: sample_softmax
params.description: Number of samples in the sampled softmax.

params.name: adaptive
params.description: Whether or not to use adaptive softmax.

params.name: dropout
params.description: The dropout probability for all fully connected layers in the embeddings, encoder, and pooler.

params.name: dropatt
params.description: The dropout ratio for the attention probabilities.

params.name: untie_r
params.description: Whether ot not to untie relative position biases.

params.name: init
params.description: Parameter initializer to use.

params.name: init_range
params.description: Parameters initialized by U(-init_range, init_range).

params.name: proj_init_std
params.description: Parameters initialized by N(0, init_std)

params.name: init_std
params.description: Parameters initialized by N(0, init_std)

params.name: layer_norm_epsilon
params.description: The epsilon to use in the layer normalization layers

params.name: eos_token_id
params.description: End of stream token id.
